required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Nutritional Status of Patients After Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplantation
clinical_study.official_title: A Survey of Nutritional Status of Patients After Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplantation

lead_sponsor.agency: The First Affiliated Hospital of Soochow University

clinical_study.source: The First Affiliated Hospital of Soochow University

brief_summary.textblock: The main objectives of this study were :(1) to comprehensively and systematically evaluate the nutritional status of patients after hematopoietic stem cell transplantation. (2) to explore the effect of nutritional factors on the prognosis of patients treated by hematopoietic stem cell transplantation.

detailed_description.textblock: This study is devised to investigate nutritional status in patients who have undergone hematopoietic stem cell transplantation in the First Affiliated Hospital of Soochow University. Evaluation time points include the day before receiving conditioning regimen, post-transplantation 180 days, the nutritional status of patients were systematically evaluated from the aspects of food intake, physical activity level, body composition, blood biochemistry, etc. Also, the effect of nutritional factors on prognosis of hematopoietic stem cell transplantaion patients will be evaluated.

primary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline fat free mass at 6 months
primary_outcome.description: Body composition analyzer INBO DY S10 (bioelectrical impedance method) is used to analyze the content of fat free mass（ kilograms）

primary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline fat mass at 6 months
primary_outcome.description: Body composition analyzer INBODY S10 (bioelectrical impedance method) is used to analyze the content of fat mass（ kilograms）

primary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline food intake at 6 months
primary_outcome.description: 24-hour dietary record and semi-quantitative food frequency questionnaire are used to evaluate the eating condition of patients

primary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline albumin level in blood at 6 months
primary_outcome.description: The content of albumin in blood is determined.

secondary_outcome.description: It is measured from the date of entry into this trial to the date of death from any cause; patients not known to have died at last follow-up are censored on the date they were last known to be alive

It is measured from the date of entry into this trial to the date of relapse from CR, or CRi, or death from any cause; patients not known to have any of these events are censored on the date they were last examined.

study_pop.textblock: Patients who have received hematopoietic stem cell transplantation in the First Affiliated Hospital of Soochow University

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients who undergo hematopoietic stem cell transplantation in the First Affiliated Hospital of Soochow University.
- Having a life expectancy of more than 3 months
Exclusion Criteria:
- Not willing to participate in the investigation
- Age less than 15 years old or more than 80 years old

facility.name: The first affiliated hospital of suzhou university

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: The First Affiliated Hospital of Soochow University
